text:
I am not a scripter/powershell person. Is there an easy way to run a script to
determine if someone is going to hit this issue? I don't want to run through the
shrink script, I want to know if there is enough room that the patch won't fail?
Link: None

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
